revised_title: Enumeration and Classification of Nuclear States in the d-Shell
tldr: The authors use a method developed by Racah to enumerate and classify the states arising from the filling of the nuclear d-shell. They introduce a new classification system based on the transformation properties of states under the group of rotations in five-dimensional space. This classification helps predict the order of levels with short-range attractive forces and provides insights into nuclear isomerism and the filling of the d-shell.
